name: SetWebinarVirtualBackground
description:
Set a webinar's virtual background branding.

This tool sets the default virtual background branding for a Zoom webinar session. It requires the 'Webinar Session Branding' setting enabled and appropriate scopes such as 'webinar:write' or 'webinar:write:admin'.

parameters.name: webinar_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the webinar to update the virtual background branding.

parameters.name: virtual_background_file_id
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual background file to update for the webinar.

value_schema.description: The virtual background file ID to update.

parameters.name: set_default_virtual_background_for_all_panelists
parameters.description: Whether to set the virtual background as the default for all panelists, including those without a current default background.

value_schema.description: Whether to set the virtual background file as the new default for all panelists. This includes panelists not currently assigned a default virtual background.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The virtual background file ID to update.

value_schema.description: The virtual background file ID to update.

parameters.name: set_default_for_all_panelists
parameters.description: Whether to set the virtual background file as the new default for all panelists. This includes panelists not currently assigned a default virtual background.

value_schema.description: Whether to set the virtual background file as the new default for all panelists. This includes panelists not currently assigned a default virtual background.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
